task.title: How to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the division feature of calculator application.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully divide numbers, you must know what is division.
taskbody.result: The result from division is displayed.
taskbody.example:
You want to divide 6 by 3. The equation will look like 6/3=2. You enter 6. Press forward slash button. Enter 3. Press equals button.
The result 2 appears on the screen.
